name: The GTO Run
description:
Dodge the cops, smash obstacles in your way  and make it to the finish line before the timer expires ! 

You play as a red GTO that runs from the cops , make sure you reach the finish line before the timer hits zero and make sure you don't get busted ! 

Compatability - 

Windows 

Mac and Android - (Coming Soon) 

Note : Open the README for controls and more info.
